summary: This document is a chain of email correspondence between an Engineering Technician at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York and a representative from Hotfoil-EHS, Inc. regarding the fabrication, specifications, and powder coating of a replacement strip search grill door for the Special Housing Unit (SHU). It details technical discussions about dimensions, hinges, bolt sizes, and color selection.

keyFacts: The Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York was fabricating a replacement 'strip search grill door' for its Special Housing Unit (SHU) in mid-2019.
The correspondence involves detailed technical specifications for the door, including hinge mounting, door width reduction, bolt sizes for a 'wicket lock', and powder coat color selection.
The contractor for the door was Hotfoil-EHS, Inc., based in Hamilton, New Jersey.
The final color request for the door was a grey powder coat, with specific RAL color codes provided (7000, 7001, or 7004).
This document is a routine facilities maintenance record and does not directly reference Jeffrey Epstein, his case, or any individuals involved in it.
